alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 2:20PM PST until February 03 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 1 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Highest amounts over 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Trinity County. This may include portions of Hwy 3 just north of Weaverville, but most of the snow will be at Scott Mtn summit north of Trinity Center. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 1 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Scott Mountain Pass may be closed. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
